name: Anilinkz - Anime - Blue Mist
description: Want a better Anilinkz experience? Well here you go! Completely revamped look and feel, It will hide the chatango box to reduce clutter, so chat will only become available if you use the main anilinkz chat link. This style is used best with ghostery + adblockplus Add this to your adblock filters to get rid of the new blockadblock detection @@||blockadblock.com^$generichide

user.name: Rahimichi
user.about:
My user-styles make badly designed websites look better.

So download them and enjoy them, also leave a nice review if possible please.

Message me for any site requests.

additional_info: Version 10 Status: I wont support the new mobile site yet because its bloody rubbish. To view chatango while using this style visit its main chat link http://animelinkz.chatango.com/ Make sure to try my other userstyles: https://userstyles.org/users/299934 If you find any bugs, report it as a question. WANT MORE WALLPAPERS? copy the image addresses from my Imgur Album 1. http://imgur.com/gallery/cjlih
